title: [WORK] Ep. 37: How to Better Love Yourself and Live More in Alignment w/ Philip McKernan
description:
This week, Ash interviews inspirational speaker, writer, and filmmaker, Philip McKernan, to find out how you can move through the roadblocks that many entrepreneurs face and find clarity on your career path. Through a series of stories, Philip will help you explore the possibilities of who you are and what you could be, exemplify the importance of courage and being honest with yourself, and explain why we should trust our intuition. Philip wants us to find a relationship with ourselves again and remember that we only give ourselves what we feel we deserve.

Philip’s Website: www.philipmckernan.com

Philip’s Book: One Last Talk
